oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Estimation of optimum wind turbine generator speed parameters
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAJU, AB
FERNANDES, BG
CHATTERJEE, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, a procedure is proposed to estimate the optimum wind turbine generator speed parameters to yield higher energy production at higher capacity factor, using normalized power curve based on Weibull probability density function of wind speed data and taking into account variation of power coefficient and blade parameters of wind turbine.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 2004 IEEE POWER ENGINEERING SOCIETY GENERAL MEETING, VOLS 1 AND 2,1995-1998
